p: Results of in vitro antibacterial properties of H. persicum EO by disk diffusion method showed that growth inhibition diameters of EO (10 mg/mL) against L. monocytogenes were 6.7±0.15 mm. The inhibition zone for ampicillin, as control positive, was 28.2±0.25 and 17.4±0.45 mm for each of the treatments, respectively. Both MIC and MBC values of the EO were 2.5 mg/mL against L. monocytogenes. MIC and MBC of nisin against L. monocytogenes were 200 and 300 IU/mL by both methods. Growth inhibition zone of L. acidophilus was 13.2±0.15 mm by agar spot test.
